abstract: Samsung will delay introduction of new smartphone while the world pays tribute to Steven P Jobs. New date for release has not been set.
snippet: “We decided it was not the right time to announce a new product while the world was expressing tribute to Steve Jobs’s passing,” a Samsung spokesman said.
lead_paragraph: “We decided it was not the right time to announce a new product while the world was expressing tribute to Steve Jobs’s passing,” a Samsung spokesman said.

headline.main: Samsung Delays Unveiling of a New Android Phone
headline.print_headline: Samsung Delays Unveiling Of a New Android Phone
headline.seo: Samsung Delays New Android Phone After Jobs’s Death
